statements: UPDATE smart_home_devices SET device_name='Smart Fridge' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE smart_home_devices SET room_name='Living Room' WHERE device_id=2;
UPDATE smart_home_devices SET active=false WHERE device_id=3;
UPDATE users SET email='new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE devices SET device_name='new_device_name' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE device_logs SET log_message='Updated log message' WHERE log_id=1;
UPDATE houses SET name = 'Updated Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE houses SET location = 'Updated Location' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE houses SET name = 'New Name', location = 'New Location' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE devices SET device_name = 'new_device_name' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE rooms SET room_name = 'new_room_name' WHERE room_id = 1;
